content: I saw a paper of @Jonathan Gorard on the arXiv presenting Categorica, built on top of Mathematica. Has anyone tried playing with it?
No, but I want to. Is it proprietary?

There is a GitHub repository: https://github.com/JonathanGorard/Categorica

However, it does not contain a license, which AFAIU means that it has the default strong copyright protections. And, of course, Mathematica is itself proprietary.
